title: What's new in v2.61.0
content:
Features:
• Brush size board (keyboard shortcut included)
• Tool presets

Enhancements:
• Option to create a palette from the active selection
• 'Bigger' option of the color picker applies to floating mode as well
•  Canvas option's color picker can accept hex input
• Above/below color keyboard shortcut
• Other minor enhancements

Fixes:
• Some keyboard shortcuts don't work on iOS 26
• Imported Aseprite files sometimes have incorrect tag colors
